title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel not responding
body:
this started last night
ive tried everything i could think of, i tried every suggestion on the boards 
cant seem to get anything to work
i continue to get the same message: PVP.net Patcher Kernel not responding

replies.body: That weird patcher kernel issue is most likely being caused by some permission issue. Your OS is probably seeing League as an unrecognized program and it shutting it down before it can load correctly. You should be able to get that straightened out by following the steps in our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), but hit me back if you're still having issues.

This has happened to me before. All I had to do was run it in **Administrator Mode** and it all worked. 
But that's the only thing that I had to do. If you have already tried that, then it is beyond me.
